title: Michael Dillon
text: I’m a physiological ecologist interested in how animals thrive in the face of varying temperatures.

title: Resources
text:
Building this using this nice guide by Sam Csik

git/github
Some issues getting up and running, largely seemed to be due to connecting the local repository to the correct remote one (follow what github says when you first have the remote repository created)
Followed this installation guide first just to double-check everything was working.
I found Happy Git useful
